summary: This document is a certification from Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, regarding the amendment of the Articles of Organization for LSJ Employees, LLC, which changed its name to LSJE. The document confirms that the amendment was duly recorded and is in full force and effect.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis certifies the amendment of the Articles of Organization for LSJ Employees, LLC.

events.title: Amendment of Articles of Organization
events.description: LSJ Employees, LLC filed Articles of Amendment to change its name to LSJE.

events.title: Certification of Amendment
events.description: Gregory R. Francis certifies that the amendment has been duly recorded.

keyFacts: Gregory R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
LSJ Employees, LLC changed its name to LSJE on March 13, 2013.
The amendment to the Articles of Organization was certified on March 21, 2013.
